headline: Someone spray painted a penis on a €1.9m Bugatti Veyron
content:
CAR LOVERS, LOOK away now. Some people just don’t have the same respect for motors that you do.They can just spray paint a penis on to a Bugatti Veyron (which costs €1.9 million) without a second thought.
    Source: Live LeakOuch.Car lovers all over the world were flabbergasted by the act, while others said felt the vandalism was akin to class warfare:

THIS IS NOT COOL BRO #learnsomerespect http://t.co/YZ7zAglekO— Joshua Stamp (@slosh_bmx) October 8, 2014

    Source: Joshua Stamp/Twitter


THIS IS NOT COOL BRO #learnsomerespect http://t.co/YZ7zAglekO

It’s definitely not just a random act of vandalism though – a Reddit user has pointed out that it’s a stunt for a prank video. What kind of person defaces a million-euro car for a video?This guy, Andrey Smygov.
